titles.title: Providing amounts from the contingent fund of the House for one-half of the expenses of investigations and studies by the Joint Committee on the Organization of the Congress in the first session of the One Hundred Third Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Accounts.

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Provides amounts from the contingent fund of the House for one-half of the expenses for investigations and studies by the Joint Committee on the Organization of the Congress in the first session of the 103d Congress.
